CustomField.description: Text formula that constructs a sentence explaining the relationship between the two Contacts
CustomField.formula: TEXT(npe4__RelatedContact__r.Salutation) + " " + npe4__RelatedContact__r.FirstName + " " + npe4__RelatedContact__r.LastName + " " + $Label.npe4__Relationship_Explanation_Connector + " " + TEXT(npe4__Contact__r.Salutation) + " " + npe4__Contact__r.FirstName + " " + npe4__Contact__r.LastName + "'s " + TEXT(npe4__Type__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Text formula that constructs a sentence explaining the relationship between the two Contacts
CustomField.label: Relationship Explanation
